bibl.title: The Meaning of Συντ( ) in Tax Lists and Tax Receipts.
bibl.note: The abbreviated expression Χ συντ( ) εἰς Υ should be supplied as Χ σὺν τ(αῖς) Υ. Ταῖς refers to ἀρτάβαις or δραχμαῖς, depending on the nature of the taxes. The expression should be translated as: "(the drachmas / artabas charged on) X together with the (drachmas / artabas) charged on Y".
bibl.seg: SMOLDERS Ruben, The Meaning of Συντ( ) in Tax Lists and Tax Receipts.

The abbreviated expression Χ συντ( ) εἰς Υ should be supplied as Χ σὺν τ(αῖς) Υ. Ταῖς refers to ἀρτάβαις or δραχμαῖς, depending on the nature of the taxes. The expression should be translated as: "(the drachmas / artabas charged on) X together with the (drachmas / artabas) charged on Y".
